snippet.title: Monster Hunter Stories - Launch Trailer | Nintendo Switch, PS4, PC
snippet.description:
Monster Hunter Stories is available now on Nintendo Switch, PS4, and PC/Steam. Ride On in this enhanced version of the first Monster Hunter RPG, featuring refined graphics, full English and Japanese voice acting, a new Museum mode, and content that was released exclusively in Japan. 

https://www.monsterhunter.com/stories/en-uk/
